QuestData.Title: Heart of the Nightmare
QuestData.Description:
I know only that my husband is somewhere deeper in this twisted forest. He is still alive, but it remains to be seen if he is whole.
<Tyrande's expression hardens into a scowl.>
Elune herself cannot protect Xavius if he is not.
QuestData.LogDescription: Track Malfurion's path through the Nightmare.
QuestData.RewardText: No one is safe from this corruption.
